questions.question_text: What 8-bit field exists in IP packet for QoS?

discussion.content: this question in ambiguos... ToS field is 16bit (2byte).. DSCP is 6bit.. ip precedence is 3 bit... and CoS is 3 bit.. so this question is not so good

choices.A: The switch will need a different IOS code in order to support VLANs and STР.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B is right

Remote access management of this switch will not be possible without configuration change

Interface vlan 1 is administratively down.You can't access this switch remotely.
Correct answer:B

Correct is A

Multiple Spanning Tree (MST) rides on top of RSTP so it converges very fast. The idea behind MST is that some VLANs can be mapped to a single spanning tree instance because most networks do not need more than a few logical topologies.

choices.E: Host В needs to be assigned an IP address in VLAN 1.
choices.A: The switch interfaces need the appropriate IP addresses assigned.
choices.C: The switch needs an appropriate default gateway assigned.
choices.D: The switch interface connected to the router is down.
choices.B: Host В and the switch need to be in the same subnet.
